p.e:
ISAAC'S STORY IS A TRAGIDY.
A YOUNG BOY WHO WAS BULLIED
IN SCHOOL AND HAD NO FRIENDS, 
HE WAS DEEPLY RELIGEOUS AND
THOUGHT OF HIMSELF AS SINFUL.
WHEN HIS MOTHER HEARD VOICES
IN HER HEAD THAT TOLD HER TO
KILL HER SON, HE HID INSIDE HIS
EMPTY TOY CHEST UNTIL HE
DIED OF SUFFICATION.


[THE BINDING OF ISAAC, 2011]
